product_name: Amphipod BeltPod SmartView Sumo Smartphone Pouch
long_description: Sized to fit bigger smartphones, such as the iPhone 6 or the Galaxy S5, this pouch mounts on your hydration waistbelt for easy access to your phone during long training runs or hikes.
short_description: Sized to fit bigger smartphones, such as the iPhone 6 or the Galaxy S5, this pouch mounts on your hydration waistbelt for easy access to your phone during long training runs or hikes.
